ComicInfo.Summary:
Jago is under attack by the Coven’s wendigo army – but the unexpected arrival of Tusk turns the tide of the battle! The two warriors compare notes – and decided to investigate the loss of their guardian spirits! Meanwhile, the ancient sorcerer Kan-Ra begins his own investigations…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Yildiray Cinar & Jorge Sutil | 1 | B | Cover B | Jonathan Lau & Jorge Sutil | 2 | C | Subscription Cover C | Cam Adams & Jorge Sutil | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Jonathan Lau | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Yildiray Cinar | 5 |

ComicInfo.Editor: Anthony Marques, Joseph Rybandt, Kevin Ketner, Matt Idelson
ComicInfo.Characters: Cinder, Jago, Kan-Ra, Kim Wu, Mira Fallegeros, Tusk
